snippet: The central question posed by both sides was whether the sadistic acts that Officer Gilberto Valle had fantasized about involved real crimes.
abstract: Closing arguments are made in case against New York City Police Officer Gilberto Valle, accused of plotting to kidnap, kill and cannibalize women; jury begins deliberating; central question posed by both sides was whether the sadistic acts that Valle had fantasized about involved real crimes.
lead_paragraph: The central question posed by both sides was whether the sadistic acts that Officer Gilberto Valle had fantasized about involved real crimes.

headline.seo: After Closing Arguments in Cannibal Case, Jury Begins Deliberating
headline.main: Closing Arguments Made, Jurors at Cannibal Trial Get Case
headline.print_headline: Closing Arguments Made in Cannibal Case; Jury Begins Deliberating
